text_sections.section_3: This slogan serves as our guiding principle for individual and systematic support of our researchers during all career phases. Concurrently it expresses our commitment to improving the visibility and reputation of our university. Our goal is to bolster researchers in enhancing their expertise and advancing their careers while fostering networking and mobility.
text_sections.section_4: The Teams Research Services (RSS) and Transfer Services (TFS) accompanies UTN researchers during all career stages in the following ways:

meta_tags.description: „Pushing U(TN) to the next level” This slogan serves as our guiding principle for individual and systematic support of our researchers during all career phases.
